protein.specific_function: Seems to be a protein kinase. In vitro it can phosphorylate casein-alpha on serine and threonine residues and histones on serine residues

reference.reference_text: Sargent CA, Anderson MJ, Hsieh SL, Kendall E, Gomez-Escobar N, Campbell RD: Characterisation of the novel gene G11 lying adjacent to the complement C4A gene in the human major histocompatibility complex. Hum Mol Genet. 1994 Mar;3(3):481-8.
